sentence.Network_en: Smoking is a causative factor in several major diseases.
sentence.Network_cn: 抽烟是引起几种严重疾病的病因。

sentence.Network_en: Both nicotine and carbon monoxide inhaled with cigarette smoking have been incriminated as causative factors.
sentence.Network_cn: 抽烟时吸入的尼古丁和一氧化碳都已经被标定为致病因素。

sentence.Network_en: Plasmodium is a protozoan which causes malaria; it is the causative agent of the disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 疟原虫是引起疟疾的原生动物; 是疾病的病原体.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 自然语言处理和计... ... Categorial Unification Grammar 范畴连并语法 [范畴合一语法] causative 使动 causative verb 使役动词.
<pa->为使役(causative)前缀、<-an>为名物化后缀/pa-…-an:亦为主事(agentive)性质的环缀语构由格位标记处所格/ta/后接关系子句构 …
causationist 信因果律者causative 成为原因的cause and effect 因果
20-巴利语佛经选译（下部）-182 ... (passive 被动式) 被… 5. (causative 使役动词) 使… 6. (infinitive 不定词) 1.可… 2.能… 8.

list.abs: 需注意的是，这里使用的单词“原因(cause)“并不是“起因(cause)和影响“或者“被告导致(cause)受害者死亡“中所表示的意义。何况，当.
肇_百度百科 ... 5. 矫正[ correct; ratify] 6. 引起；引发；招惹[ cause] 2. 同本义[ strike].

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French causatif, -ive, or late Latin causativus, from causare 'to cause'

entry.def: Causative factors are ones which are responsible for causing something.

example.ex: Both nicotine and carbon monoxide inhaled with cigarette smoking have been incriminated as causative factors.
example.tran: 抽烟时吸入的尼古丁和一氧化碳都已经被标定为致病因素。

sentences.sentence: "poverty as a causative factor in crime"

auth_sentence.content: The causative agent may be a primary or opportunistic pathogen.
auth_sentence.res_content: The causative agent may be a primary or opportunistic pathogen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The causative agent may be a primary or opportunistic pathogen.

auth_sentence.content: Proper education and radical understanding on aging and disease causative factors.
auth_sentence.res_content: Proper education and radical understanding on aging and disease causative factors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Proper education and radical understanding on aging and disease causative factors.

auth_sentence.content: These studies show that it is the genes that are largely the causative agent.
auth_sentence.res_content: These studies show that it is the genes that are largely the causative agent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These studies show that it is the genes that are largely the causative agent.
